QuestData.Title: The Lesson of the Iron Bough
QuestData.Description: First, you will need weapons suited to your talents. Retrieve a pair of daggers from one of the weapon racks below, bring them to me, and show me that you know how to hold them properly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve and equip a pair of Trainee's Daggers.
QuestData.RewardText: A fine weapon. It should suit your needs well.$B$BNow let's put it to use.

Objectives.Objective: Loot and Equip a Trainee's Dagger
Loot and Equip a Second Trainee's Dagger
